name: Tej Pratap Singh
tagline: A passionate software engineer building modern web experiences.

about.title: About Me
description: I'm a dedicated and innovative software engineer with a passion for crafting robust and scalable applications. My journey in technology has been driven by a constant desire to learn and apply cutting-edge solutions to real-world problems.

With a strong foundation in both front-end and back-end development, I enjoy tackling complex challenges and building intuitive user experiences. I believe in writing clean, maintainable code and am always eager to collaborate on exciting new projects.
Outside of coding, I enjoy [mention a hobby or two, e.g., hiking, reading, gaming] which helps me stay refreshed and brings a different perspective to my problem-solving.

experience.title: Member Technical Staff
description: Developed and maintained high-performance web applications using Java and Spring Boot.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to design and implement new features.
Optimized application performance and ensured scalability.

experience.title: Software Engineer
description: Contributed to the development of enterprise-level software solutions.
Participated in code reviews and mentored junior developers.
Implemented responsive UIs with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

manualProjects.name: Personal Blog
manualProjects.description: A personal blog built with Next.js and Markdown. Features include dark mode, commenting, and search.

manualProjects.name: E-commerce Store
manualProjects.description: A full-stack e-commerce application with user authentication, product management, and payment integration.

manualProjects.name: Task Management App
manualProjects.description: A simple and intuitive task management application with drag-and-drop functionality and real-time updates.

skills: Java, Spring Boot, React, JavaScript, HTML5, CSS3, Tailwind CSS, Node.js, Express.js, MongoDB, Git, GitHub, VS Code, Maven, Gradle, MySQL, PostgreSQL, Docker, Kubernetes, Jira, Confluence, AWS
